column5: Two of us have a room booked at Stu's (Cats On Th Red) the nites of October 6-9. Our companions in a second boat will not be able to make the trip and we are now looking for another boat (2-3 fisherman) to join us (there is plenty of room and it defrays expenses!). Anyone interested??
Wow thats too bad. I would be interested.But i'm heading down that way on the 19th of October until the 22nd.Good luck.Make sure you post on your success.FISH ON.
